name: StopBabiesCryRelaxingMusic
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, what's in the news?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des: If you have a baby that cant just stop crying,then this skill will make your baby calm down and stop him or her crying. Just ask alexa open flash briefing and then this skill play soothing and relaxing music for your baby. Enjoy
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
